DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine blood level tolerability SB-649868 Elderly Female population
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetic Profile SB-649868 Elderly Female Population
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Healthy adult elderly female male Female must nonchildbearing potential Body weight =50 kg EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Abuse alcohol drug Positive Hepatitis B surface antigen , Hepatitis C antibody HIV Use prescription nonprescription drug within 7 day prior first dose study medication Smoking history = 10 cigarette day last three month History cardiovascular , psychiatric , autoimmune , respiratory relevant gastrointestinal disease Participation clinical trial previous 6 month
